<a href="mailto:siekkonrⓐcvut.cz">siekkonrⓐcvut.cz</a>  

I currently do research on the [R language](http://www.r-project.org) and its use of laziness.  

I am interested in distributed systems, programming languages, and their intersection. In particular, I'm interested in transactional memory, concurrency, distributed systems, and functional programming.  

My PhD thesis explored the safety and parallelism trade-off in distributed transactional memory.

I seek difficult ways to solve simple problems and sometimes vice versa.
